title: What is Machine Learning?
content: Machine Learning is teaching computers to learn from data, just like how you learn from experience!

title: Your First ML Concept: Classification
content: Classification is like sorting your toys into different boxes based on their features.

title: Fun with Numbers: Prediction
content: Prediction is guessing a number based on other numbers, like guessing how many candies are in a jar.

title: Exploring Data: Visualization
content: Data visualization is like drawing pictures to understand your data better. It helps us see patterns!

title: Learning from Mistakes: Model Evaluation
content: Evaluating your model is like checking your homework. It helps us know how well our machine is learning!

title: Making Decisions: Decision Trees
content: A decision tree is like a game of 20 questions, where each answer leads to a new question or a final decision.

title: Finding Patterns: Clustering
content: Clustering is grouping similar things together, like organizing your closet by types of clothes.

title: Learning from Experience: Reinforcement Learning
content: Reinforcement learning is like training a pet. The computer learns by getting rewards for good actions!
